output_list.description: The mintToken function allows the owner to increase the total supply of the token arbitrarily, which is a security vulnerability.
The freezeAccount function allows the owner to freeze an arbitrary user's asset, aka the 'tradeTrap' issue.
The _transfer function allows the owner to transfer an arbitrary amount of tokens between any addresses, aka the 'transferAny' issue.
The sell function allows the owner to arbitrarily increase the sell price, aka the 'sellPriceManipulation' issue.
The buy function allows the owner to arbitrarily increase the buy price, aka the 'buyPriceManipulation' issue.
